byline: Mark Garrison, Rob Schmitz, Kai Ryssdal, Peter O'Dowd, Sally Herships, Karen Clark and Sam Beard
teaser: It's the day after in Boston and Mark Garrison talks to business owners and workers. A flood of footage from cell phones and other devices are flooding in to law enforcement; we talk to a lab that helps filter through the noise. Across the ocean, the London marathon is scheduled for next week and organizers there say they are on high alert. Plus, housing starts are in. What are the trends in housing?

title: Marketplace for Tuesday, April 16, 2013
